channel.title: Roadmap on Ergo
channel.description: Recent content in Roadmap on Ergo

item.title: Ergo Platform Roadmap for 2020
item.description: Ergo community made a lot in 2019: Very stressful but successful mainnet launch A lot of updates for Ergo protocol reference client to improve its stability and enhance functionality. Wallets: Magnum, CoinBarn (coming to ChromeStore, binaries available), UI panel in the node First applications, in form of command-line scripts, so not for regular users yet: a tool for crowdfunding campaigns, Ergo Notary, Ergo Oracle. Few Ergo improvement proposals, already implemented!
